Sentencas: This work proposes a power generation system consisting of steam reformer and SOFC-H+ fuelled by different types of fuel, i.e., ethanol, glycerol and biogas.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: The performance analysis of integrated system is performed based on thermodynamic calculation through Aspen Plus simulator.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: The total of the Gibbs free energy minimization is used to determine product composition at equilibrium.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: The electrochemical model not only considers all voltage losses but also includes the effect of current leakage as a result from the electrolyte used.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: Considering the operating condition of steam reformer, it is found that the gas product contains the highest amount of hydrogen without the carbon formation when reformer is operated at 973 K with steam to carbon ratio of 1.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: In addition, the simulation results show that the SOFC-H+ operated at 973 K and 1 A/cm(2) can provide a suitable compromise between system performances and exhaust gas composition.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: The use of glycerol reformate has the highest cell and system efficiencies and fuel utilization compared to the others.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: In addition, the integrated system fuelled by glycerol can release low CO amount whereas there is more heat provided to the surrounding.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels

Sentencas: Therefore, it can be concluded that glycerol is suitable renewable fuel for SOFC-H+ integrated system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of a proton conducting SOFC integrated system fuelled by different renewable fuels
